import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.carousel.css'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.theme.default.css'; export const ContactUs = () => { return ( <>
Help and Support > Contact Us
Support Ticket List About Us Help & Support
Our Address

A108 Adam Street, New York, NY 535022

Email Us

rooms@treasurequarters.com

Call Us

+1 5589 55488 55

Get in touch
Submit
) } export default ContactUs;
